articles.content: Before Matt Duffer ever watched “A Nightmare on Elm Street,” a babysitter he had growing up in North Carolina told him the legend of the sweater-clad, dream-invading clawed ghoul Freddy Krueger. When… [+3442 chars]

articles.author: Brian Marks, Ashley Hume, Ashleigh Gray
articles.title: Euphoria's Dominic Fike says he's 'very much in love' with costar Hunter Shafer amid split rumors - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor and singer Dominic Fike indicated that his relationship with his Euphoria costar Hunter Schafer was stronger than ever in the latest issue of GQ. He said he was 'very much in love' with Hunter.
articles.content:
